block_detail:
Block applications that you don't want to use VPN while connected.

After selecting or removing any item, if connected, please disconnect and reconnect the VPN.

about_description: 818 FLASH VPN is an open-source software designed to provide unrestricted access to the internet. This project is developed with the aim of providing a secure and reliable solution for users, and any commercial or non-commercial use of the 818 FLASH VPN source code is not permitted.
